channel.title: Server Log-In Issues
channel.description: I finally got a server to work, but when I go to log in on the moparscape download client it gets not even half way through the start download then it goes back to the login screen... im sure someone knows why this is happening[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 09, 2009, 04:37:38 pm[/size][hr]its saying "couldnt open output stream" anyway to fix this?

item.title: Server Log-In Issues
item.dc:creator: @pkinnubpk pkinnubpk
item.description:
@pkinnubpk wrote:

What server is it? You may be using the wrong client because if it has added graphics or items you may need the client that goes with the server. The mopar scape client is VERY old.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Log-In Issues

item.description:
